name: Flight of the Amazon Queen \u2013 Android Retro Adventure Game
blurb: Recreate and enhance the retro classic Flight of the Amazon Queen on Android, and relive the glory days of graphical adventure gaming.

rewards.reward: A wallet-friendly shortcut to Memory Lane! Become part of an awesome retro revival project with your name boldly emblazoned on the official website, get a link to our blog to keep track of the project\u2019s progress, and the best present of all \u2013 our everlasting gratitude! This is the initial phase of our Kickstarter campaign, running until the final step of the project.

All the nostalgic niceties above, plus a free Amazon Queen add-on app made just for you. A \u201cMagic Squares\u201d game built from screenshots of the original title, with an extra-special 'thank you' opening screen. Perfect for those long nights when you\u2019re lost in the jungle!

All of the above, even more gratitude, and our special Amazon Jungle survival app! This pledge includes our "iWatermelon" app for Android, which tells you if a watermelon is ripe and ready. Don't go into the jungle without it!

All of the above, our eternal gratitude, plus a free beta version of the game. Be the first to rediscover all those lonely Amazonian Warrior babes! Experience the remake before anyone else, and assist us in creating a more enjoyable game as part of our QA team.
All of the above, and prove you're Joe King's number one fan by decorating your wall with an official Flight of the Amazon Queen poster designed by our team of animators specially for this project.
All of the above, way more gratitude, and a beautiful limited edition Flight of the Amazon Queen t-shirt that\u2019s guaranteed to send Amazon Warrior women wild!

All of the above, plus a unique comic book that tells the story of the retro remake project. The perfect in-flight reading material, and a great survival handbook for when your plane crashes in the jungle!

All of the above, plus the option to choose one of our existing Android apps (Magic Squares or iWatermelon) and we'll make any changes or additions that you can think of. Send us an email to discuss your ideas, and you'll have the most enviable Android in the Amazon!

All of the above, plus a unique handheld puzzle made especially for this project by our lead designers. Just think; you'll still be able to play this puzzle game when your Android\u2019s battery goes flat and you're stranded in the jungle!

All of the above, and during the development we'll record every event that occurred from beginning to end to create an exclusive cookbook documenting the creation of this project. It could save your life when the plane goes down and the dinosaurs are on the prowl!
All of the above, and your name will appear on a slide at the beginning of the Android version of Flight of the Amazon Queen. You'll be as famous as Faye Russell!

All of the above, plus access to development forums and entry into our Hall of Fame on the game\u2019s official site with the title of Master Backer. This honorary degree includes a unique, \u201c1 of 5\u201d numbered shirt with a personalized \u201cMaster Backer\u201d insignia. Let the world know you've flown in the famous Amazon Queen!

All of the above, plus entry into our Hall of Fame with the grand title of Gold Backer. This honorary degree includes a unique, \u201c1 of 3\u201d numbered shirt with a personalized \u201cGold Backer\u201d insignia, a signed illustration of you and the game\u2019s heroes by our art team, and a limited edition of the game with a special dedication of your choice. Faye Russell will be all over you!

All of the above, plus entry into our Hall of Fame with the grand title of Platinum Backer. This honorary degree includes a unique shirt with a personalized \u201cPlatinum Backer\u201d insignia, and a direct phone call (or Skype call) from the lead developer! It's the only way to fly first class on the Amazon Queen!
An exclusive advertising space, limited to you alone, within the game. Make this pledge and become the ultimate King or Queen of the Amazon!
